by Jimmy on April 20th, 2009
Question
Help answer this question below.
Did you ever go to a drive in restaurant, wher the servers wore roller skates? Share your answer here... Want to attach an image to your answer? Click here.
Only upload an image if you have the rights to it, and ensure that it complies with our terms of use .
Like Report Share: Facebook Twitter Other Sort answers by: Greatness / Likes Date submitted Answers. 17 helpful answers below.
by xhepera on April 20th, 2009
Yes. A very long time ago. There was a drive-in restaurant in Hollywood, CA, called Tiny Naylor's, that had carhops on roller skates.
Comments
thank you
Report
by Jimmy on April 20th, 2009
Add a comment...

by Anonymous on April 20th, 2009
About twenty years ago in Texas - can't remember the name of the place but they were speeding around a large parking lot delivering fast food - it sure was a sight to see : )
Comments
thank you

by Teller of Truth on April 20th, 2009
When I was a kid I use too see those types of restaurants everywhere, now they are as extinct as the dinosaur...
Comments
they were great weren't they :) thank you
Report
by Jimmy on April 20th, 2009
They were great...As a kid it was a bonus to see this very attractive woman come out on skates and deliver food too our car...I would fall in love with her and then she would skate on out of my life, I fell in love with many skating waitresses at those types of places, of course I fell in love with just about any woman I found attractive, anyways...There are some of those restaurants in Nevada still, I believe Sonic is doing it these days...
Report
by Teller of Truth on April 20th, 2009
thanks again
Report
by Jimmy on April 20th, 2009

3 comments | Post one | Permalink

No...but if I go on Teusday I am Canadian and they wear ice skates.

thanks

Yes, we have one of those in our small town

they are so cool and i miss having them around. I haven't been to one since i was a kid. thank you Kay

You are welcome! They are pretty neat.

by klkl on April 21st, 2009
No I cannot say I have...but having been a waitress once...skates and trays of food, that takes good balance..

by Ice man on April 20th, 2009
Hahaha, yes. Many years ago a couple of my buddies and I would ride our motorcycles over to the A&W, in the neighboring town, for teen burgers and to flirt with the carhops on skates. The girls would bring out the burgers and say something about us not having windows to hang the trays on, and we would talk them into hanging around to hold the trays, while we flirted with them. Man, those were the days !! :)
Comments
thank you
Report
by Jimmy on April 21st, 2009
Add a comment...
